summary: TAKATA RECALL. THE DEALER REFUSES TO REPAIR MY RECALLED AIRBAGS EVEN AFTER 2 YEARS OF CONCERN. I HAVE ASKED SINCE NOTIFIED OF THE RECALL  FOR THE AIRBAGS TO BE FIXED AND ALWAYS GET THE SAME AANSWER THAT THE PARTS ARE NOT AVAILABLE.  I CAN NOT DRIVE THE CAR DUE TO THE SAFETY AND CAN NOT SELL THE CAR BECAUSE THERE IS AN OUTSTANDING RECALL. WHAT CAN BE DONE?
